_header: Saviour of the world save us
Subjects: litanies; prayers, for use in church
_description: A Litany by the Cross and Blood against ‘al maner yuel temptacion’ — three lines

BodLauMis601.Transcription:
Sauiour of þe worlde saue ousþat by þy cros and
                    þy blod þow hast bouȝth ouslorde god we prayet þe helpe
                    ows
BodLauMis601.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus Codices Laudiani.
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1858: 248.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 348.
